casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Barbara Jean MYERS-MCNEIL 453P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2019

Michelle F. Lynch, Attorney at Law, For Myers-McNeil, Barbara Jean.

Christine Wright, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of March 2019 by Defendant to Withdraw as Private Assigned Counsel and to Appoint the Appellate Defender:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2019."
